reporting_cycle: before the end of the present mandate
summary:
The Security Council:
- Reaffirms previous resolutions on Western Sahara, seeking a just, lasting and mutually acceptable solution.
- Takes note of the Secretary-General's report (S/2002/178) of 19 February 2002.
- Decides to extend MINURSO's mandate until 30 April 2002, as recommended by the Secretary-General, and to consider options described in his report.
- Requests the Secretary-General to report on the situation before the current mandate ends.
- Decides to remain seized of the matter.
